abstract: Profile of Rev Brian Jordan, Roman Catholic priest in Brooklyn who has uncovered story of Rev William B Farrell, pastor who nearly century ago challenged New York City over its welfare system, and against whom city used controversial surveillance tactics; Jordan notes that contemporary debates about surveillance by police echo debates during Farrell's time.
lead_paragraph: A century ago, the Rev. William B. Farrell engaged in a battle with New York officials that exposed a widespread pattern of police wiretapping.

headline.main: Remembering Brooklyn Priest Who Took On City, and Ears of the Police
headline.print_headline: Recalling Priest Who Exposed Police Wiretaps a Century Ago
